body.p:
When you work with , the system prompts you with message windows if necessary. There are several types of messages:
Informational For example, to inform you that a was imported completely Error For example, if something critical happens Warning or Question For example, to ask whether you really want to delete a folder
All messages have a unique number and start with EQF to identify them as messages.

With all message windows where you are asked to confirm actions on an object, you can select a Yes to All button in the first message window that pops up after an action has been requested. When you pressed this button, assumes the answer Yes on all subsequent message windows that ask for a confirmation. For example, while analyzing documents of a folder, a message asks if you want to overwrite the target document because translation for a document has already started. If you answer Yes to All, all subsequent messages are suppressed.
